abstract: JPMorgan Chase‘s chief executive confirmed Tuesday that the bank will be keeping nearly half of the employees at Bear Stearns, the struggling investment bank that JPMorgan agreed to buy in March.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase‘s chief executive confirmed Tuesday that the bank will be keeping nearly half of the employees at Bear Stearns, the struggling investment bank that JPMorgan agreed to buy in March.

headline.main: Dimon Confirms More Than Half of Bear Staff to Be Cut
